no-account.title: Let’s get started
no-account.description: You can login or register to unlock more features. Create a room as a guest to start playing immediately!

no-room.title: Create your room
no-room.description: To host games you will need a room. Create or join one with an invitation!

delete-account-bottom-sheet.title: Delete Account
delete-account-bottom-sheet.subtitle: Are you sure?
delete-account-bottom-sheet.content: A deleted account cannot be restored. Therefore, all data will be lost.

leave-bottom-sheet.title: Do you really want to leave this room?

join-room-offline-bottom-sheet.title: Do you want to join your room in offline mode?
join-room-offline-bottom-sheet.subtitle: Your current game data will be lost in this process.

settings-bottom-sheet.title: Settings
settings-bottom-sheet.singleDeviceMode: Play offline by only using one device and manually adding players
settings-bottom-sheet.other-admin: The game can continue even if you leave the room by making an other user the admin for the round

start-game-modal.deck-subtitle: Choose the Deck you want to play

navigation.no-room-owned: You have to create a room first
navigation.no-account: Create an account or sign in

it-authenticate-modal.title: Let’s get started
it-authenticate-modal.description: To join a room you have to log in or register first. You can register as a guest if you don't want to create an account.

create-account.title: Create your account
create-account.description: Create a account so you never loose your data and get more features like downloading new decks from the store

errors.auth/user-not-found: Corresponding user could not be found
errors.auth/email-already-in-use: There is already a account using this e-mail
errors.auth/network-request-failed: Could not establish connection. Looks like you are offline.
errors.room-source-service.get-room.no-user-fou: No user found for whom a room can be created
errors.room-state.join-room.no-user-found: You must create a user before you can join a room
errors.room-state.join-room.cant-join-room-when: You can only join your own room when you are offline
errors.room-state.join-room.cant-join-offline-r: Can't join room in single device mode
